issue.title: [C++] Use -O2, not -O3, for release/optimized builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17436](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17436). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
-O3 can produce longer build times and larger binaries for next to no performance benefits.
We should perhaps tune down the optimization level to -O2 on non-MSVC compilers.
